242.name: Traditional Swedish
242.caption: Traditional full-body Swedish Massage to relieve tension, improve circulation and leave you rested.
242.description: Swedish massage therapy is the modality that comes to mind when most people think about massage. As the best-known type of bodywork performed today, one of the primary goals of the Swedish massage technique is to relax the entire body. This is accomplished by rubbing the muscles with long gliding strokes in the direction of blood returning to the heart. But Swedish massage therapy goes beyond relaxation. Swedish massage is exceptionally beneficial for increasing the level of oxygen in the blood, decreasing muscle toxins, improving circulation and flexibility while easing tension.

items.caption: Not tested on animals.  No animal ingredients. Container design may differ slightly from what is pictured.
items.description: Spa Lotion was created just for you. Conditions and protects your skin with a moisture-rich, luxurious blend of vitamins to soothe and soften your skin.  Apply it all over your body after bath or shower, before bedtime and anytime in between.

NAKED Volume White Grapefruit & Mosa Mint Shampoo has 0% parabens, gluten and colorants Shampoo that is color safe and provides volume.

items.title: Chilled Wine
items.caption: What may have started as a libation offering to the gods became a tradition for honoring guests. Once upon a time, a host drank from a communal vessel to prove goodwill.
items.description: What may have started as a libation offering to the gods became a tradition for honoring guests. Once upon a time, a host drank from a communal vessel to prove goodwill (and the absence of poison) before offering drink to a guest. Now we use the toast to formalize relationships and offer praise at the most elaborate of functions, but never underestimate or forget the power of the informal toast to convey that same honor and goodwill among friends and family gathered with much less formality.

246.name: Deep Muscle Therapy
246.caption: Deep muscle massage with heated rocks to ease pain, tension and improve mobility and range of motion.
246.description:
Deep tissue massage targeted for the under layers of muscle to release chronic patterns of muscle tension and loss of flexibility and motion. Customized to your pressure preference using slow forearm, hands and elbow massage.

The essential custom massage perfectly executed to meet your needs. Various modalities like Swedish, Deep Tissue and Hot Rock are blended with armotaherapy oils to achieve well being and relaxation.

247.name: Seasonal Body Treatment
247.caption: Red Arizona clay polishes skin smooth with volcanic pumice while absorbing bacteria and toxins.
247.description:
Red Arizona clay polishes skin smooth with volcanic pumice while absorbing bacteria and toxins. A targeted massage with a cooling application of grapefruit and ginger body milk soothes and seals in moisture,

The clay will help the completion of the transformation of the Light Body. The Light which the planet has received after the new millennium has helped to activate the DNA. The clay is helping the transformation of our DNA take place at a much higher vibration and much quicker.

248.name: Infrared Sauna
248.caption: Infrared Sauna helps to remove impuratives from your body. Speciifically the fat cells where your body stores waste and harmful toxins such as chloresterol and heavy metals. When used properly, our Infrared Sauna will help provide a lifetime of healthy living.
248.description:
Infrared Sauna helps to remove impuratives from your body. Speciifically the fat cells where your body stores waste and harmful toxins such as chloresterol and heavy metals. When used properly, our Infrared Sauna will help provide a lifetime of healthy living.

The infrared sauna is slightly different than a normal sauna. It produces the same rays that come from the sun and filters out the UV radiation, so it only gives you the infrared radiation. That radiation that is infrared goes a little bit into your skin so, without heating you up and the external environment too much, it heats the body up.
